name: monkey-of-death
text: "PS I got shot by Ray again" is basically the best way to end a e-mail.

name: ghede
text: A comment left by ghede was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, antecen, mystkmanat)

name: soticoto
text: I'm so gonna buy a gun and give it to a cat.

name: wazza
text:
I actually changed my gmail suffix to that

used to be "Veni, Vidi, Reliqui"

name: deimosrising
text: I eagerly await a flashback to the first time

name: dezufnocosem
text: A comment left by dezufnocosem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by n00b, tetrisattack, LuckyG)

name: baryonyx
text: Do Yahoo? I am Yahoo.

name: chloraloner
text: Explains how he could bang a website.

name: biddlebubbly
text: I always wondered why the alt text says "Ray is 9600 baud". What does Ray's sad old modem have to do with this? Maybe it was supposed to say Beef is 9600 baud.

name: stuart
text: Maybe Beef is not 9600 baud! Why the hell does he not use this more often? THEORY: Outside the hospital, Beef does not own a WAP.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Isn't Beef's Mom horrible? Why would she be big on e-mail?

name: aaron_haynes
text: I've read this strip a hundred times and that only just now occurred to me as well.

name: alejandroadam
text: I guess time's have changed. but then why does he live with Grandma K.?

name: dans
text: I assume she's in jail.

name: _cheesekayke
text: It was not yet established that Beef was from Circumstances.

name: riazm
text:
ACHEWOOD CONTINUITY POLICE
Although we have no firm evidence to refute your claim, the ACPD would like to put forward the following for your consideration:

In this strip we hear Beef say that he doesn't like guns, now I know this isn't much to go on, but could it not be supposed that the reason for this fear is this strip? The very strip which exposed Beef's circumstances for the first time?

Its all purely...circumstantial, but I put forward that Beef WAS from Circumstances at this point. if not publicly, then certainly in Onstad's mind.

name: tangles
text: as a self-professed achewood-o-phile, you could not pay me enough to sign up to the ACPD.

name: bhlaab
text: i thought she died when she was shot

name: riazm
text:
ACHEWOOD CONTINUITY POLICE
The last known sighting of Corliss Kazenzakis was in this comic:

http://achewood.com/index.php?date=06202008

She did not appear to be dead, or shot.

name: mystkmanat
text: She shot Beef's dad, she didn't get shot.

name: ph3r
text: Speaking about pre-continuity, why does Andretti think Beef's full name is 'Roasted Beef'?

name: mystkmanat
text: She's a neglectful meth addict.  It seems highly suspect that she would care about email, or even remember her son's former Halloween costumes.

name: tripleg
text: of course horrible people have e-mail. who do you think forwards chain letters? even the homeless guys on my old street had email

name: atypicaloracle
text: More importantly, just because she would never answer nor care about the e-mail would not stop Beef from sending it. Sending letters he knows won't be answered is just a Roast Beef thing to do.

name: mystkmanat
text:
Awww :(
Chubbied for being both sad and true.

name: tombsgrave
text: He has the power of modems.  Presumably others as well.

name: deancain29
text: best sign off to an email. I promise to sign my next one off like this.

name: m3funkyb
text: I just realized that Ray is still in the Sopranos character in this script.

name: pwb
text: Dr. Andreti's first appearance?

name: unfun
text: I love Philippe in this one.

name: awko
text: Not only does he have a passable wireless internet connection, he also has a word processor.

name: stuart
text: Or he could just have the ASCII set and the TCP handshakes for Sendmail memorized.

name: gormster
text: What "ferrous material"? Bullets are made from lead! This doctor is clearly a quack.

name: honesttom
text: Also, I don't believe it's possible for a spine to become a modem.

name: gormster
text: That too!

name: philosophe
text: they make steel shot too

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
The bullet was at least 50% ironic.

CAN'T YOU SEE?

name: tekende
text: "No one in science would" makes this a five for me.

name: jack
text: This is one of the most reasonable things Pat has ever said.

name: hateandwar
text:
Pat says reasonable things all the time. They're horrible, but a lot of his gripes aren't totally unreasonable.

It probably says something to me that I kind of identify and sympathize with Pat, doesn't it?

name: johnnybaverage
text: It's OK, we forgive you.

name: hateandwar
text: Thank you, that means a lot.

name: landowmpg
text: Personally, I think Pat was just deflecting the question because he's incapable of ever saying anything nice.

name: windfish
text: Now, when I see an action movie, I am going to imagine that everybody who gets shot is, instead of dying, receiving a wireless internet router in his spine.  This will either immensely improve or ruin action movies for me forever.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: "Not again, Beef! I told you that boy was trouble!"

name: deusoma
text: Since it seems to be popular, I'll put forward that I hear Dr. Andretti as Michael Dorn. He can be as authoritative as all hell, and anyone who's played Fallout 2 knows he can do sarcastic.

name: professorhazard
text: George Clooney.

name: littlefatdog
text: Nobody has acknowledged that solely from this strip we know Beef's full name is "Roasted Beef". Until now.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: I believe the Doctor has misread, his full name is Cassandra "Roast Beef" Kazenzakis.

name: hrm
text: Has Beef ever used this ability beyond this strip?

name: dovey
text: No, because the connection is way too slow for him to be bothered with it.

name: pzukowski
text: Tough way to get Wi-Fi, but a minor miracle of lead-based technology, eh?

name: arella_dawn
text: Poor Beef, always gentle toward others and not placing blame

name: desert_donkey
text: i got beef with this strip. there were no modems around when Beef was 6.

name: random_shorts
text: I'm going to postulate that you were rated lame for using "beef" to refer to both the character and your issue (capitalization not-withstanding).

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
the alt text alludes to say that Ray is slow.

the end.

name: carlyle
text: It always struck me that Beef was leaving a lot for his mom to guess at.

name: viskeilover
text: I know what I'm going as for Halloween this year!

name: inhmn
text: I got shot by Ray again :DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
